name: All materials delivered to site have been inspected thoroughly by RCC Earthworks and the Client and:
b) Pipe class, type and size matches plans.
Manholes & Trenches excavated to depth and checked with laser (allowed for 100mm bedding)
Trench bedding material installed as per specification
Pipe laid to grade (as per drawings) ensuring socket faces upstream and is free of foreign materials prior to installation of adjoining pipe
Each joint visually inspected (rubber rings, witness marks, etc)
Haunching compliant and accepted by the client.
Suitable material backfilled in compacted layers
Compaction testing Completed and Complies (attach compaction test results)
CCTV Carried out upon completion of works
Lean Mix / Concrete dockets attached (if applicable)
All materials delivered to site have been inspected thoroughly by RCC Earthworks and the Client and:
b) Pipe class, type and size matches plans.
Pits & Trenches excavated to depth and checked with laser (allowed for 100mm bedding)
Pits Installed at correct height and orientation
Trench bedding material installed as per specification
Pipe laid to grade (as per drawings) ensuring socket faces upstream and is free of foreign materials prior to installation of adjoining pipe
Each joint visually inspected (rubber rings, witness marks, etc) and lifting holes plugged
Haunching compliant and accepted by the client.
Suitable material backfilled in compacted layers
Compaction testing Completed and Complies (attach compaction test results)
CCTV Carried out upon completion of works
Lean Mix / Concrete dockets attached (if applicable)
All materials delivered to site have been inspected thoroughly by RCC Earthworks and the Client and:
b) Fittings, Pipe class, type and size matches plans.
Trenches excavated to depth and checked with laser (allowed for 100mm bedding)
Trench bedding material installed as per specification
Pipe laid (as per drawings) ensuring socket is free of foreign materials prior to installation of adjoining pipe.
Each joint visually inspected (rubber rings, witness marks, etc)
Thrust Blocks installed, where applicable. (Images Attached)
Haunching compliant and accepted by the client.
Suitable material backfilled in compacted layers
Compaction testing Completed and Complies (attach compaction test results)
Lean Mix / Concrete dockets attached (if applicable)
Pipe / Pit / Fitting Tech Data attached
